TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpListenerResponse extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class HttpListenerResponse Implements IDisposable
public ref class HttpListenerResponse sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 表示对 对象正在处理的请求的响应。

span.span: Represents a response to a request being handled by an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当客户端发出对某个对象处理的资源的请求时 ，该请求和响应将在对象中提供给您的应用程序 。When a client makes a request for a resource handled by an object, the request and response are made available to your application in an object. 请求由 对象表示，并且在属性中可用 。The request is represented by an object and is available in the property. 响应由 对象表示，并且在属性中可用 。The response is represented by an object and is available in the property. 您可以通过设置各种属性（例如、和）来自定义响应 。You can customize the response by setting various properties, such as , , and . 使用 属性可获取 可向其中写入响应数据的实例。Use the property to obtain a instance to which response data can be written. 最后，通过调用方法将响应数据发送到客户端 。Finally, send the response data to the client by calling the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Abort() cil managed

summary.span: 关闭到客户端的连接而不发送响应。

span.span: Closes the connection to the client without sending a response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对已关闭的对象调用此方法不起任何作用。Calling this method on an object that has already been closed has no effect. 如果响应尚未关闭，则此方法会将其关闭，并关闭关联的 和 对象。If the response has not already been closed, this method closes it and the associated and objects. 与客户端的连接也会关闭，而不考虑 客户端请求的属性值。The connection to the client is also closed, regardless of the property value of the client request.

summary.span: 将指定的标头和值添加到此响应的 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Adds the specified header and value to the HTTP headers for this response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法等效于 在由属性返回的集合上调用方法 。Calling this method is equivalent to calling the method on the collection returned by the property. 如果中指定的标头 `name` 不存在，则此方法会将新的标头插入到 属性的集合中。If the header specified in `name` does not exist, this method inserts a new header into the property's collection. 如果 `name` 集合中存在，则此方法会将现有值替换为 `value` 。If `name` is present in the collection, this method replaces the existing value with `value`. 若要将值添加到现有标头而不替换现有值，请使用 方法。To add a value to an existing header without replacing the existing value, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性添加标头。The following code example demonstrates adding a header using this property. remarks.format: ## Remarks `Content-Length`标头表示响应的正文数据的长度（以字节为单位）。The `Content-Length` header expresses the length, in bytes, of the response's body data. 当使用不发送数据块或原始格式的格式时，必须设置 属性。When using a format that does not send the data chunked or raw, you must set the property. 否则，不 会发送响应数据。If you do not, the does not send the response data. 有关响应标头的完整列表，请参见 枚举。For a complete list of response headers, see the enumeration. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置此属性的值。The following code example demonstrates setting the value of this property. remarks.format: ## Remarks Cookie 是存储在本地 (客户端) 计算机上的 Web 服务器的名称/值文本数据。A cookie is name/value text data from a Web server that is stored on the local (client) computer. 支持以下 cookie 格式： Netscape、 [rfc 2109](https://www.rfc-editor.org/info/rfc2109)和 [rfc 2965](https://www.rfc-editor.org/info/rfc2965)。The following cookie formats are supported: Netscape, [RFC 2109](https://www.rfc-editor.org/info/rfc2109), and [RFC 2965](https://www.rfc-editor.org/info/rfc2965). ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查对 cookie 的请求，并返回一个新的 cookie，其中包含响应（如果请求中没有）。The following code example checks a request for a cookie, and returns a new cookie with the response if the request did not have one. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#20)] [!code-vb[Net_Listener_Basic#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/VB/test.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CopyFrom(class System.Net.HttpListenerResponse templateResponse) cil managed

span.span: The instance to copy.

summary.span: 将属性从指定的 复制到此响应。

span.span: Copies properties from the specified to this response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您定期将多个属性从其默认值更改为一组固定的新值，则使用 实例作为模板会很方便。If you regularly change many properties from their default values to a fixed set of new values, it is convenient to use an instance as a template. 自定义模板响应一次，而不是单独配置每个响应，而是通过调用 方法来根据模板响应中的属性值配置新响应。Customize the template response once and, instead of configuring each response separately, call the method to configure a new response based on property values in the template response. 以下属性将从复制 `templateResponse` 到当前实例。The following properties are copied from `templateResponse` to the current instance. - - - - - - ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过复制模板响应来创建响应。The following code example demonstrates creating a response by copying a template response. [!code-csharp[NCLListener#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/CS/sample.cs#5)] [!code-vb[NCLListener#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/vb/sample.vb#5)]

summary.span: 获取或设置服务器返回的标头名称/值对集合。

span.span: Gets or sets the collection of header name/value pairs returned by the server.

value.span: 实例，包含要包括在响应中的所有显式设置的 HTTP 标头。

span.span: A instance that contains all the explicitly set HTTP headers to be included in the response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 响应标头包含元数据信息，如响应的日期和时间、响应服务器的标识，以及响应正文中包含的数据的 MIME 类型。Response headers contain metadata information such as the date and time of the response, the identity of the responding server, and the MIME type of the data contained in the response body. 有关响应标头的完整列表，请参见 枚举。For a complete list of response headers, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 如果尝试使用 "标头" 属性设置 Content-length、keep-alive、传输编码或 WWW 身份验证标头，则会引发异常。If you attempt to set a Content-Length, Keep-Alive, Transfer-Encoding, or WWW-Authenticate header using the Headers property, an exception will be thrown. 使用 或 属性设置这些标头。Use the or properties to set these headers. 不能手动设置传输编码或 WWW 身份验证标头。You cannot set the Transfer-Encoding or WWW-Authenticate headers manually. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在中显示标头 。The following code example demonstrates displaying the headers in a . [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#23)] [!code-vb[Net_Listener_Basic#23](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/VB/test.vb#23)]

exception.span: 为设置操作指定的 实例对响应无效。

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示服务器是否请求持久性连接。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the server requests a persistent connection.

value.span: 如果服务器请求持久性连接，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the server requests a persistent connection; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 HTTP 客户端和服务器需要在短时间内多次交换数据，则持久性连接会使其通信速度提高，因为这样可以避免为每个消息打开和关闭 TCP 连接所需的开销。If an HTTP client and server expect to exchange data multiple times in a short period, a persistent connection speeds up their communications by allowing them to avoid the overhead required to open and close a TCP connection for each message. 持久性连接广泛用于新式 Web 浏览器和 Web 服务器之间的通信。Persistent connections are in widespread use in communications between modern Web browsers and Web servers. (RFC 2616) 的 HTTP/1.1 协议规范中详细介绍了持续性连接，请参阅 RTF 编辑器网站 ([https://www.rfc-editor.org/](https://www.rfc-editor.org/)) 。Persistent connections are described in detail in the HTTP/1.1 protocol specification (RFC 2616) available at the RTF Editor Web site ([https://www.rfc-editor.org/](https://www.rfc-editor.org/)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置此属性的值。The following code example demonstrates setting the value of this property. [!code-csharp[NclListener#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/CS/sample.cs#7)] [!code-vb[NclListener#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/vb/sample.vb#7)]

span.span: This object is closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 写入返回的对象之前，必须显式设置属性 。The property must be set explicitly before writing to the returned object. > [!NOTE] > 关闭请求不会关闭此属性返回的流。Closing the request does not close the stream returned by this property. 如果不再需要该流，则应通过调用 Close 方法将其关闭。When you no longer need the stream, you should close it by calling the Close method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此方法。The following code example demonstrates calling this method. summary.span: 配置响应以将客户端重定向到指定的 URL。

span.span: Configures the response to redirect the client to the specified URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于将客户端重定向到资源的新位置。The method is used to redirect a client to the new location for a resource. 此方法将响应的 `Location` 标头设置为 `url` ， 属性设置为 ，并将 属性设置为 "Found"。This method sets the response's `Location` header to `url`, the property to , and the property to "Found". ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此方法。The following code example demonstrates calling this method. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#27](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#27)] [!code-vb[Net_Listener_Basic#27](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/VB/test.vb#27)]

value.span: ，包含要在 标头中发送给客户端的绝对 URL。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Location`标头指定客户端定向到的 URL，以定位请求的资源。The `Location` header specifies the URL to which the client is directed to locate a requested resource. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性不会自动设置 属性。Setting this property does not automatically set the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置此属性。The following code example demonstrates setting this property. summary.span: 获取或设置响应是否使用分块传输编码。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the response uses chunked transfer encoding.

value.span: 如果响应设置为使用 Chunked 传输编码，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the response is set to use chunked transfer encoding; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 块消息的正文由一系列块组成。The body of a chunked message is made up of a series of chunks. 每个块区由两部分组成：块区数据和实际数据的大小。Each chunk comprises of two parts - the size of the chunk data and the actual data. 如果设置为 true，则使用分块传输编码发送响应。When set to true the response is sent using chunked transfer encoding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果两个 cookie 的、和属性的值相同，则将其视为相同 。Two cookies are considered the same if the values of their , , and properties are the same. 如果这三条信息是相同的，则该方法会尝试更新 cookie。If these three pieces of information are the same, the method attempts to update the cookie. 名称和域比较不区分大小写，但路径比较区分大小写。The name and domain comparisons are not case sensitive, but the path comparison is case sensitive. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此方法。The following code example demonstrates calling this method. summary.span: 获取或设置返回给客户端的 HTTP 状态代码。

span.span: Gets or sets the HTTP status code to be returned to the client.

value.span: 为请求的资源指定 HTTP 状态代码的 值。

span.span: An value that specifies the HTTP status code for the requested resource.

value.span: 默认值为 ，指示服务器成功处理了客户端的请求并将请求的资源包括在响应正文中。

span.span: The default is , indicating that the server successfully processed the client's request and included the requested resource in the response body.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 客户端使用服务器返回的状态代码来决定如何继续。Clients use the status code returned by the server to decide how to proceed. 值为 指示服务器已成功处理客户端的请求，并在响应正文中包含请求的资源。A value of indicates that the server successfully processed the client's request and included the requested resource in the response body. 其他常见状态代码包括 ，指示在服务器上找不到请求的资源，并 指示不需要在响应正文中返回请求的资源，因为客户端的资源的缓存副本是最新的。Other common status codes include , indicating that the requested resource was not found on the server, and , indicating that it was unnecessary to return the requested resource in the response body because the client's cached copy of the resource is up-to-date. 有关可能的状态代码的完整列表，请参见 枚举。For a complete list of possible status codes, see the enumeration. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置此属性的值。The following code example demonstrates setting the value of this property. [!code-csharp[NclListener#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/CS/sample.cs#7)] [!code-vb[NclListener#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/vb/sample.vb#7)]

exception.span: 有效值介于 100 和 999 之间（包含 100 和 999）。

span.span: Valid values are between 100 and 999 inclusive.

span.span: The default is the RFC 2616 description for the property value, or an empty string ("") if an RFC 2616 description does not exist.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法发送响应并释放由占用的资源 。Use the method to send the response and release resources held by an . 若要放弃响应并释放此实例占用的资源，请使用 方法。To discard the response and release the resources held by this instance, use the method.
